column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Professor Beans - Thank you very much for the stars. I'm glad you enjoyed your stay with us. And we appreciate your understanding our extended wait times during peak hours
column2: as well as our seating arrangements. And it's true: Our FM1960 location is the largest JINYA in the nation
column3: and has a lot more room for guests and large parties. Thank you again!
